We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private SuperTrend _str;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_str = STR(symbol, period, multiplier);

// In OnData()
if (_str.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "STR Current", _str.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.str = self.STR(symbol, period, multiplier)

# In OnData()
if self.str.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "STR Current", self.str.Current);
